gcci.text: The $3.17/hr H100 price reflects constrained supply and strong utilization, but as hyperscalers diversify into lower-cost accelerators and supply normalizes, capex risk moderates and utilization-based pricing will face downward pressure.

gtpi.text: At $1.25 per 1M input tokens, DeepSeek is pricing at the aggressive end of the market, intensifying API price wars and accelerating efficiency gains as providers compete on cost per token and throughput.

gagl.text: Kimi’s 120 TWh annual load underscores growing grid strain from AI workloads, amplifying the case for nuclear baseload and renewables to stabilize demand while cutting carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment is buoyant with strong GPU demand and token price compression, but growth sustainability faces bubble risk as capex and grid constraints outpace monetization, making disciplined pricing and utilization critical.
